get.summary: ListServices returns all services in the specified namespace, or all namespaces if not specified.

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
namespace is the Kubernetes namespace to list services from.
If not specified, services from all namespaces are returned.

get.summary: GetService returns detailed information about a specific service.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description:
id is the unique identifier of the service to retrieve.
Format: namespace:service-name (e.g., "default:nginx-service")

service.description: service contains the detailed service information.

v1alpha1GetServiceResponse.description: GetServiceResponse contains the requested service details.

services.description: services is the list of services found in the namespace(s).

v1alpha1ListServicesResponse.description: ListServicesResponse contains the list of services in the requested namespace(s).

id.description: id is a unique identifier for the service in format namespace:service-name (e.g., "default:nginx-service").

namespace.description: namespace is the Kubernetes namespace containing the service.

instances.description: instances are the backend instances (pods) that serve this service.

v1alpha1Service.description:
Service represents a Kubernetes service with its backing instances.
Services in different clusters that share the same name and namespace are considered the same service.

ip.description: ip is the IP address of the instance.

pod.description: pod is the name of the Kubernetes pod backing this instance.

namespace.description: namespace is the Kubernetes namespace containing the pod.

v1alpha1ServiceInstance.description: ServiceInstance represents a single backend instance serving a service.
